message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a great opportunity for you to get a fantastic deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $160.
Hi Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase this product. I am willing to pay $140 for it.

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I'm not willing to sell it to you for $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $152. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate the effort. I would like to counter with an offer of $148 for the product.

Hi Bob, thank you for your counteroffer. I'm still not willing to sell the product for $148. I'm willing to make one more adjustment and offer it to you for $155. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I would like to counter with an offer of $150 for the product.
